question: It is a requirement of this position that you possess knowledge, skill and mental development equivalent to completion of High School. Do you meet this requirement?

Please describe your education/experience citing specific examples with detail. To ensure that your answer is fully evaluated and that you receive the appropriate credit for this question, please be sure to include as much detail as possible in your response. Education/experience can be gained from a variety of situations including school, work, or another life experience. Please provide when and where you gained this education/experience. If you have no education/experience, please enter N/A.
answer: Yes, I meet this requirement. I graduated from high school and have continued my education and professional development throughout my career. I earned my Certified Pharmacy Technician certification from Osco Pharmacy in 1996, and have completed additional coursework and training in healthcare administration, customer service, and office management. My work experience includes roles at Fox Lake Animal Hospital, Midwest Sports Medicine, and Family Medicine, where I developed strong skills in patient care, documentation, and teamwork. These experiences have provided me with the knowledge, skills, and mental development equivalent to or exceeding a high school education.
